Indian Revenue Service Salary 2025 - Complete Breakdown

Quick Overview: Indian Revenue Service officers earn ₹56100-225000 per month with 385 current vacancies.

Salary Structure

Pay Level10-16
Salary Range₹56100-225000
Current Vacancies385

Frequently Asked Questions

What is the starting salary of Indian Revenue Service?

The starting salary is ₹56100 per month.

How many vacancies are there for Indian Revenue Service?

There are currently 385 vacancies available.
